attributes.action: We want tap moved back further
attributes.additional_details: We have had this ongoing issue for year alot of this regarding lorries is on the news  but no mention of aycliffe residents who this effects year  after year day in day out
attributes.background: We want the lorries moved back further so the noise constantly going off at all hours does not wake children up, and especially key workers needing sleep as do all residents of aycliffe

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
